title: Game screen won't load (On University Wifi)
body: The league client works fine (Shop/champ select/etc), but when the game client pops up (where you can see all 10 players and their skins) it says I can't connect to the server. I'm on my university wifi but it worked last year so i'm slightly thrown off. I have disabled my firewall and all that jazz. Any help/suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Does this happen when you're on a completely different network, such as at a coffee shop or at home? If it doesn't you may need to reach out to your Network Administrator on campus to see if there's a whitelist or a specific configuration you need in order to access our game servers.
me too the loading screen still at 0% and the game doesnt start
